issue.title: [C++] script for unpack avx512 intrinsics code
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8192](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8192). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Use script to generate avx512 intrinsics code for arrow/util/bpacking function, similar to <https://github.com/lemire/FrameOfReference/tree/master/scripts>

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8192?focusedCommentId=17066610) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 6697
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6697>
